member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.TreeViewFolderBrowser
member.summary: TreeViewFolderBrowser works a bite like FolderBrowserDialog but was designed to let the user choose many directories by Chechboxes.
member.remarks: Because this class delegates the drive, folder and ImageList specific task's to a instance, this class needs a wired instance before you can call any method wich fill's the tree view.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.ITreeViewFolderBrowserDataProvider
member.summary:
ITreeViewFolderBrowserDataProvider is used by a instance and is responsible for
retrieve the computer drives and directories
Imagelist which is used to assign images to the nodes created by this instance.
ContextMenu
calls the interface method's and provide a instance which let you create node's and give you access to the underlying instance.

member.param: The helper instance which provides method's and properties related to create and get nodes.
The node on which the context menu was requested.

member.summary: Creates a tree node and add it to the TreeNodeCollection.

The path the node represents.
True to add + sign, otherwise no + sign appears.
True to check node in each case, otherwise false to allow normal check against selected paths.
Specifies if this node is a special folder. Special folders do not request data from the attached data provider.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.CheckboxBehaviorMode
member.summary: Indicating whether check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control and how the tree view handle related events.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.CheckboxBehaviorMode.None
member.summary: No check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.CheckboxBehaviorMode.SingleChecked
member.summary: Check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control. The user can check directories.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.CheckboxBehaviorMode.RecursiveChecked
member.summary: Check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control. The user can check directories, the subdirectories are checked recursive.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes
member.summary: Defines the DriveTypes used for Win32_LogicalDisk.This enumeration can be treated as a bit field, that is, a set of flags.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.All
member.summary: All drive types

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.NoRootDirectory
member.summary: NoRootDirectory

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.RemovableDisk
member.summary: Drive has removable media. This includes all floppy drives and many other varieties of storage devices.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.LocalDisk
member.summary: Drive has fixed (nonremovable) media. This includes all hard drives, including hard drives that are removable.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.NetworkDrive
member.summary: Network drives. This includes drives shared anywhere on a network.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.CompactDisc
member.summary: Drive is a CD-ROM. No distinction is made between read-only and read/write CD-ROM drives.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.RAMDisk
member.summary: Drive is a block of Random Access Memory (RAM) on the local computer that behaves like a disk drive.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes
member.summary: Defines the DriveTypes used for Win32_LogicalDisk.This enumeration can anot be treated as a bit field

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.NoRootDirectory
member.summary: NoRootDirectory

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.RemovableDisk
member.summary: Drive has removable media. This includes all floppy drives and many other varieties of storage devices.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.LocalDisk
member.summary: Drive has fixed (nonremovable) media. This includes all hard drives, including hard drives that are removable.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.NetworkDrive
member.summary: Network drives. This includes drives shared anywhere on a network.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.CompactDisc
member.summary: Drive is a CD-ROM. No distinction is made between read-only and read/write CD-ROM drives.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.RAMDisk
member.summary: Drive is a block of Random Access Memory (RAM) on the local computer that behaves like a disk drive.
